docs.text:
Anuraag Tummanapally


tummanapally (dot) anuraag [at] gmail (dot) com




I am an M.Tech Student in the 
Department of Electrical Engineering
 at IIT Bombay. My Interests lie in (but not limited to) Communications and Signal Processing.


I've done B.Tech from the 
Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering
 at VNIT Nagpur in 2016, with my Final Year Project being in 
Image Processing
, under the guidance of 
Prof.V.R.Satpute
.


Work Experience


Worked for a E-Commerce company 
Nykaa
 as a Software Developer for a tenure of 1 year, after my B.Tech.


POR


Position(s) of Responsibility:


Present: 






Web Co-ordinator for 
EE Student Reading Group
 IIT Bombay.






Web Nominee for 
PGAC
 IIT Bombay.






RA(Research Assistant) at 
EE Department
 IIT Bombay.






Past:




Web Secretary for 
Hostel1
 IIT Bombay from July 2017 - June 2018




Hobbies


I like to spend most of my free time watching movies, and TV Series.


Other than that, I enjoy drawing cartoons, playing chess, and snooker.


Reading Books has recently become my favourite pass-time activity.


CV


This is the link to my 
CV


Contact


You can reach me through: 




Mail: tummanapally (dot) anuraag [at] gmail (dot) com




    
   
  
  


Note: Don't try to contact on weekends :P
